title: A Question of Trust: Episode 202
description:
It was a normal night out for Craig Keogh with lots of alcohol and drugs. By the early hours he was in a bit of a state as the taxi dropped him off to his caravan in the East Midlands.

But Craig didn't go home. He went the other way, with other plans. Plans that would shortly leave an innocent woman dead.
